notes: Very modern, newly renovated apartment with pristine white finishes, recessed lighting, and new appliances including microwave and gas stove. The space is extremely clean with smooth tile floors and rounded corners on cabinetry, making it relatively baby-safe. There is a small balcony with solid railings visible; good natural light from large sliding doors. The unit comes unfurnished with built-in wardrobes in the bedroom, AC units, and adequate electrical outlets throughout.
